definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: vomit up, spue out, disgorge (NH id., Hiph.; As. ḳâ’u, spit  Meissn:Suppl.83; Ar. bote0 vomit; Eth. [qa0’a] qay0a: qe0a: vomit);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[קָאָה]] Le 18:28, but read prob. [[קָ֫אָה]] Pf. 3 fs. (Di Baen); Impf. (

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. sf. consec. [[וַהֲקֵאתוֹ]] Pr 25:16; all vomit up:—c. acc., lit. Pr 23:8, Pr 25:16, Jon 2:11; fig. of land casting out inhab. Le 18:25, Le 18:28, Le 18:28, Le 20:22 (all H); of disgorging riches Job 20:15.
